body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for reaching out to Cox Auto Group. My name is Roy Cox. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Roy! My name is Carol Jackson.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's a pleasure to assist you, Carol. Can you provide me with your phone number so we can reach out to you easily?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is one eight zero zero five five five two two one zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Carol. To further assist you, could you also provide your email address?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course! My email is carol.jackson@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Carol, for sharing that information. I will make sure our team looks into the shipping issue related to your car. Your excitement will soon be matched by having your car delivered on time.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: That's great to hear! I can't wait to drive my new car. Thanks for your help, Roy.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Carol. If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to reach out. Thank you for your time and have a wonderful day!

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Roy! Have a great day too.
